pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9][Windows] Fixing OGRE Terrain &Paging INCLUDE_DIRS not folded into GAZEBO_INCLUDE_DIRS

content.raw: Great catch! The issue seems to be related to case insensitive file systems, so I think it should not be an issue on Linux systems with ext4 filesystems. As far as I remember also macOS by default has a case insensitive file system, but to be honest the problem originally emerged in the compilation of gazebo-yarp-plugins \(see [https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/pull/406](https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/pull/406)\) that is a project that we regularly compile on macOS without problems.
